articles.title: Crystal Meth
articles.description: Crystal meth is short for crystal methamphetamine. It is just one form of the drug methamphetamine. Methamphetamine is a white crystalline drug that people take by snorting, smoking, injecting, or even orally. It creates a false sense of happiness and well-being, leading to a strong desire for repeated use.

desired: Rush of confidence, hyperactivity, and energy

contacts.name: Houghton House
contacts.address: 432 York Ave, Randburg 2194, Johannesburg, South Africa

articles.title: Heroin
articles.description: Heroin is a very addictive drug made from morphine, derived from the opium poppy plant. It can appear as white or brown powder, or black tar. Heroin is an opioid and produces euphoria but leads to dependence and cravings.
articles.effects: Creates intense pleasure but leaves users with depressed mood and cravings after the high wears off.

contacts.address: 432 York Ave, Randburg 2194, Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa

articles.title: Cocaine
articles.description: Cocaine is a powerfully addictive stimulant made from coca leaves. As a street drug it appears as a fine, white powder. It elevates dopamine levels, causing euphoria and energy but also carries severe health risks.

articles.title: Nicotine
articles.description: Nicotine is a highly addictive stimulant found mostly in tobacco but also in tomatoes, eggplants, and potatoes. Cigarettes deliver nicotine rapidly through inhalation, reinforcing addiction.
articles.effects: Provides stimulation and relaxation but causes strong dependence.

articles.title: Alcohol
articles.description: Alcohol is one of the most commonly used addictive substances worldwide. Some people can moderate, but others develop alcoholism, with negative personal and social consequences.
articles.effects: Impaired judgment, health risks, addiction, and social consequences.

articles.title: Ecstasy
articles.description: Ecstasy (Molly) is a synthetic drug with stimulant and hallucinogenic effects. It creates emotional warmth, increased energy, and sensory distortions. Originally a club drug, its use has spread more widely.

contacts.name: Houghton House
contacts.address: 432 York Ave, Randburg 2194, Johannesburg, South Africa

articles.title: Amphetamine
articles.description: Amphetamine is a stimulant drug usually seen as amphetamine sulfate (Benzedrine). It enhances alertness, confidence, and reduces fatigue, but chronic use leads to dependence.

contacts.name: Houghton House
contacts.address: 432 York Ave, Randburg 2194, Johannesburg, South Africa
